dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.offer.rule.ProdOfferPricePolicyVariable
dataStructure.description:
A type of PolicyVariable that represents a ProductOffering, ProductOfferingPrice, or ProductSpecificationType.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ProdOfferPricePolicyVariable

child.name: derivationAlgorithm
child.description:
A reference to a logical sequence of steps for determining the value of the ProdOfferPricePolicyVariable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: derivationAlgorithm

child.name: productOffering
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ProdOfferPriceVariableDefinedByProdOffer

This association end is optional
